death.attack.killed_by_turret: %1$s was shot to death by a turret
death.attack.killed_by_turret.player: %1$s was shot to death by a turret while trying to escape %2$s
block.ringlesgunturret.no_access_message: You don't have access to that gun turret.
gui.text.main_label: Settings affect all turrets you own
gui.button.ringlesgunturret.target_all.t: Will not attack pets, respects player settings
message.ringlesgunturret.warning.targeta: Warning: The turret on this setting will attack villagers, sheep, wild horses, sniffers, and other passive mobs. It will not attack tamed animals except for angry wolves.
message.ringlesgunturret.warning.not_own: You don't own this gun turret; it will not inherit any of your settings.
gamerule.survivalClaimTurret: Players in survival can claim unowned gun turrets
